FileLineReader
FileLineReader

Reads line from a file while ignoring comments.

One line comments start with //, multiline comments are denoted by \/* *\/.

Functions
NextLine
bool NextLine(
std::ifstream &file,
std::string &line
)

Reads the next non-commented line.

Parameters
file
std::ifstream&

The opened file stream to read from, if the stream is closed this function just returns false

line
std::string&

The read line is stored here

Returns

true if there is more to read
